blog.name: queen-ofsunflowers

blog.description: I'm nineteen years old and am a complete nerd. I have my love for my fandoms and I'm not afraid to show it. | Like what you see? Consider buying me a ko-fi maybe?

summary: What do you think I’m going to pick? I am a Ravenclaw with a heart of gold and a wand that kicks ass. I HAVE NO REGRETS. At this...
body:
What do you think I’m going to pick? I am a Ravenclaw with a heart of gold and a wand that kicks ass. I HAVE NO REGRETS.

At this point, I’m starting to think he might actually be hurt. It has happened before. Who says that it won’t happen again? 

I STILL HAVE NO REGRETS.

Wait. What?

Oh. SWEET. Now I have no reason to regret my choices!

Yup! Definitely! Unless the plot calls for it, I will not step into another common room that is not my own.

Speaking of which… 

Nah… I don’t think so.

Respect the bugs!! Unless they come in your house. That’s what I do. Stay in your zone, I’ll stay in mine.

Yes. Because someone is going to threaten a twelve year old into doing something like kill a person.

oh god, I really hope that’s not the case.

That is definitely not cryptic in any way shape or form.

summary: A Summer Exchange Ron and Pansy, a harry potter fanfic | FanFiction
title: A Summer Exchange Ron and Pansy, a harry potter fanfic | FanFiction
description: So I’ve decided to post the first half of my next Summer Exchange story! Last year the story was all about Harry and Daphne and it was my most successful story so far. This year it’s all about Ron and Pansy! Please go check it out and let me know what you think!

tags: i love my babies so much omg
summary: “Fuck you.”
title: “Fuck you.”
body:
“Fuck you,” Draco said when Harry turned down his handshake and walked out of the robe shop.

“I don’t tolerate that kind of language, Mr. Malfoy,” Madam Malkin snapped.

“What? Oh…sorry,” but he was not sorry at all.

“Fuck you,” Harry said when Draco stole Neville’s Remembrall and had to fly up to get it from him. 

“Fuck you,” Draco and Harry both mumbled under their breaths before turning to duel each other. 

“Fuck you!” Draco yelled in pain after Harry cast sectumsempra on him. 

“I’m so sorry, I deserve that, oh my god, Malfoy!” Draco could’ve sworn he heard Harry say as his vision blacked out.

“Fuck you,” Draco said smiling when Harry jumped out from under his invisibility cloak, apparently not dead at all, but almost making Draco’s heart stop when the Dark Lord had announced it. 

“Fuck you,” Harry said laughing after Draco had been dared to punch him in the arm during a party in the eighth year common room.

“Fuck you,” Draco said after Harry kissed him for the first time, because he wasn’t sure what else to say, and what was he supposed to do when the Saviour of the Wizarding World kisses you while drunk?

“Fuck you, okay,” Draco said when Harry asked him on a date the day after.

“Fuck you,” Draco said, shaking his head laughing when Harry had stumbled over the words trying to ask Draco if he wanted a blow job.

“Fuck me,” Draco moaned on the night when it finally happened, and Draco got to have sex with Harry Potter.

summary:
Teddy: Draaaacoooo! I brought you something for your biiiirthdaaaaay!!
Draco: What?
Teddy: You’re interested in dark objects,...
body:
Teddy: Draaaacoooo! I brought you something for your biiiirthdaaaaay!!
Draco: What?
Teddy: You’re interested in dark objects, right? I stole this from the Dark Magic Hidden In Common Objects class at the Auror’s Institute
Draco: And you’re giving it to me so I tell you what curse it has and you pass an exam, right?
Teddy: You’re so smart!! You should have being the Head of Ravenclaw House!!
Draco: I should be annoyed, but I’m proud of your Slytherin thinking

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

blog.name: sheripper-fanficer
blog.title: Where's-My-Hogwarts-Letter?
blog.description: Hey I'm Bisexual | A Ravenclaw | writer: AO3 , Fanfiction.net | Captive Prince | Six of Crows | Art And Naruto

summary: Draco: Go on Potter, what do you see?  Harry: Er- well – Draco: Say it! Harry: It's a – Draco screamed: PAW! Why is there a paw...
caption:
Draco: Go on Potter, what do you see?

Harry: Er- well –

Draco: Say it!

Harry: It’s a –

Draco screamed: PAW! Why is there a paw where my hand should be?

Harry: Because you were cursed –

Draco: And why was I cursed?

Harry sighed: Because I was standing next to you.

Draco: Ruddy Potter and his fame!

Harry spluttered: Fame?!

(Draco calls being chased by dark wizards all the time fame?!

But as always, Draco pretended to hear nothing.)

Draco: Tell me Potter, how many famous pawed potioneers have you heard of?

Harry: None?

(Harry hasn’t been keeping check after any famous potioneers, but it seemed like the answer Draco was fishing for.)

Draco: None!

Harry: Hermione said it’ll go away after three days –

Draco: I heard what Granger said! First of all – why are we taking her word for it? She’s not even a healer –

Harry: She’s Hermione! (Harry disagreed heatedly, as though that was explanation enough – and it was. But Draco wouldn’t be calmed down.)

Draco: And secondly – how am I supposed to brew potions for the next three days with a PAW!

(Draco nearly shoved it into Harry’s glasses.

Harry really wanted to pet it; it looked so cute. Not that he’d dare tell Draco that.)

Harry: I’ll make this right – I’ll lend you my hand until yours comes back.

Draco spluttered: You’ll spend three days by my side helping me brew potions? Because I stood near you? Have some self respect Potter you’re a wizard!

Harry: Draco, choose what to be angry at, otherwise I really can’t find a way to settle this argument.

Draco: Look here Potter I hardly want your useless arse near my potions – we did take this subject together at Hogwarts in case you forgot – you’ll ruin everything –

(Harry rubs his temples, trying to quiet his headache – the type that only Draco manages to cause.)

Draco: So instead give it some use and help me for the three nights – hardly anything I can do with a paw – your arse on the other hand –

Harry blushed violet: Er –

That day Auror Potter saw a civilian in need, and bravely answered the call.

THE END ;)

check it out on AO3 here

Draco: I heard what Granger said! First of all – why are we taking her word for it? She’s not even a healer –

Harry: She’s Hermione! (Harry disagreed heatedly, as though that was explanation enough – and it was. But Draco wouldn’t be calmed down.)

Draco: And secondly – how am I supposed to brew potions for the next three days with a PAW!

(Draco nearly shoved it into Harry’s glasses.

Harry really wanted to pet it; it looked so cute. Not that he’d dare tell Draco that.)

Harry: I’ll make this right – I’ll lend you my hand until yours comes back.

Draco spluttered: You’ll spend three days by my side helping me brew potions? Because I stood near you? Have some self respect Potter you’re a wizard!

Harry: Draco, choose what to be angry at, otherwise I really can’t find a way to settle this argument.

Draco: Look here Potter I hardly want your useless arse near my potions – we did take this subject together at Hogwarts in case you forgot – you’ll ruin everything –

(Harry rubs his temples, trying to quiet his headache – the type that only Draco manages to cause.)

Draco: So instead give it some use and help me for the three nights – hardly anything I can do with a paw – your arse on the other hand –

Harry blushed violet: Er –

That day Auror Potter saw a civilian in need, and bravely answered the call.

THE END ;)

check it out on AO3 here
trail.content:
Draco: Go on Potter, what do you see?

Harry: Er- well –

Draco: Say it!

Harry: It’s a –

Draco screamed: PAW! Why is there a paw where my hand should be?

Harry: Because you were cursed –

Draco: And why was I cursed?

Harry sighed: Because I was standing next to you.

Draco: Ruddy Potter and his fame!

Harry spluttered: Fame?!

(Draco calls being chased by dark wizards all the time fame?!

But as always, Draco pretended to hear nothing.)

Draco: Tell me Potter, how many famous pawed potioneers have you heard of?

Harry: None?

(Harry hasn’t been keeping check after any famous potioneers, but it seemed like the answer Draco was fishing for.)

Draco: None!

Harry: Hermione said it’ll go away after three days –

Draco: I heard what Granger said! First of all – why are we taking her word for it? She’s not even a healer –

Harry: She’s Hermione! (Harry disagreed heatedly, as though that was explanation enough – and it was. But Draco wouldn’t be calmed down.)

Draco: And secondly – how am I supposed to brew potions for the next three days with a PAW!

(Draco nearly shoved it into Harry’s glasses.

Harry really wanted to pet it; it looked so cute. Not that he’d dare tell Draco that.)

Harry: I’ll make this right – I’ll lend you my hand until yours comes back.

Draco spluttered: You’ll spend three days by my side helping me brew potions? Because I stood near you? Have some self respect Potter you’re a wizard!

Harry: Draco, choose what to be angry at, otherwise I really can’t find a way to settle this argument.

Draco: Look here Potter I hardly want your useless arse near my potions – we did take this subject together at Hogwarts in case you forgot – you’ll ruin everything –

(Harry rubs his temples, trying to quiet his headache – the type that only Draco manages to cause.)

Draco: So instead give it some use and help me for the three nights – hardly anything I can do with a paw – your arse on the other hand –

Harry blushed violet: Er –

That day Auror Potter saw a civilian in need, and bravely answered the call.

THE END ;)

summary: Lie to me
title: Lie to me
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2kRmILE

by lukwash

Harry and Diana accidentally travel back in time 20 years to the Marauders’ Era. Messy Magic, Lies, Secrets spilled. Home is eventually an option but will they take it? Is it worth it?

sneak peak:

Sirius pushed Harry up against the wall. Harry gasped softly at the sudden roughness he was showing. He leaned his head down to the other boy’s eye level and attacked Harry’s mouth with his. One hand gripping his waist and the other in his hair as their warm mouths’ molded with each other. Harry clutched his dark black hair and tugged.

Sirius chuckled against Harry’s mouth, bodies pressed against each other. “You like it rough, don’t you pretty boy?” Sirius breathed against his mouth, then tugged at Harry’s bottom lip with his teeth releasing a soft moan from the smaller boy.

Words: 1038, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death

  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Harry Potter, James Potter/Lily Evans Potter, Female/Female

blog.description: Mibba is a creative writing site designed for authors to share their stories, poems and articles and gain feedback from a growing audience.

summary: The Potter Twins and the Philosopher's Stone
title: The Potter Twins and the Philosopher's Stone
body:
On that fateful Halloween night when James and Lily Potter are murdered, their infant twins, Harry and Aralynn, are sent to live in separate homes—Aralynn with a magical family, and Harry with an ordinary one. However, when they’re both accepted to Hogwarts, and things start to get spooky.

Deep Dark Beasts

It was not the fact that Filch had caught them that made them so anxious. Of course, that didn’t help, but the real reason they felt as though they were going to vomit at any given moment was that…

Read more…

ao3: hellsinki

mainblog: matarsack

summary:
Today, Draco Malfoy becomes 38. 
I learned about his existence when I was 11, some 18 years ago. At first, I chose the easier...
body:
Today, Draco Malfoy becomes 38.

I learned about his existence when I was 11, some 18 years ago. At first, I chose the easier path, becoming interested in the main characters (I chose Hermione – I never really liked Harry, because he wasn’t appreciative enough of the great opportunity of studying all those cool subjects at Hogwarts while I was wasting my time at my crappy school, learning nothing useful.) Then I discovered my love for Snape (I loved his sarcastic remarks aimed at Harry and Ron, I thought they were funny), and I guess it was through Snape that I came to love Draco.

Loving Draco wasn’t easy at all. The books were trying too hard to paint him in a negative, pathetic light. I always thought there is more to Draco than JK Rowling is willing to share with us. She just needed a stereotypical bully to make her main characters look good in comparison. But I always had an active imagination, and in my mind, I thought about Draco’s story; about his mannerism, his idiosyncrasies, his strengths and weaknesses. At the time, I didn’t know anything about fanfiction. Naturally, my first ever introduction to the brilliant world of fanfiction was through Draco.

I learned that fanfiction has the power to break the author’s dictatorship over the characters. So, Rowling didn’t like Draco? Fine. I will find other authors who do. And I did. People who saw potential in Draco and invested so much time, effort and love into painting his character in all different colors. I loved the Draco in those stories; the Draco that was not just a foil with predictable behavior and comments, but the protagonist of his own story, with his own conflicts and struggles, his own moments of success and failure.

At a very young age I realized that I will not allow an author to dictate to me who to like and who to dislike. I will not allow ‘anyone’ to do that to me. Even now at 28, I am still seeing fans asking others to ‘justify’ their interest in a ‘problematic’ character, and frankly, I am tired of seeing that. I am sure that characters like Draco are, too.

So I guess, what I am trying to say, is that my interest in Draco at such an early age taught me how to liberate my mind, my imagination, my opinions. It taught me to think independently from the author, that I don’t have to agree with everything I read in books. That the ‘reality’ seen through Harry Potter’s eyes is subjective, that we all like to think of ourselves as the actual hero of every story, and in many cases, villian is not an unredeemable monster, but just someone who doesn’t agree with our version of reality. This realization helped me through a lot of hard times because my values differ greatly from those of my country - which is a dictatorship.

Liking Draco Malfoy was the harder choice, but it taught me more things than going with the flow would have ever done.

So…happy birthday Draco Malfoy.

reblog.comment:
Today, Draco Malfoy becomes 38.

I learned about his existence when I was 11, some 18 years ago. At first, I chose the easier path, becoming interested in the main characters (I chose Hermione – I never really liked Harry, because he wasn’t appreciative enough of the great opportunity of studying all those cool subjects at Hogwarts while I was wasting my time at my crappy school, learning nothing useful.) Then I discovered my love for Snape (I loved his sarcastic remarks aimed at Harry and Ron, I thought they were funny), and I guess it was through Snape that I came to love Draco.

Loving Draco wasn’t easy at all. The books were trying too hard to paint him in a negative, pathetic light. I always thought there is more to Draco than JK Rowling is willing to share with us. She just needed a stereotypical bully to make her main characters look good in comparison. But I always had an active imagination, and in my mind, I thought about Draco’s story; about his mannerism, his idiosyncrasies, his strengths and weaknesses. At the time, I didn’t know anything about fanfiction. Naturally, my first ever introduction to the brilliant world of fanfiction was through Draco.

I learned that fanfiction has the power to break the author’s dictatorship over the characters. So, Rowling didn’t like Draco? Fine. I will find other authors who do. And I did. People who saw potential in Draco and invested so much time, effort and love into painting his character in all different colors. I loved the Draco in those stories; the Draco that was not just a foil with predictable behavior and comments, but the protagonist of his own story, with his own conflicts and struggles, his own moments of success and failure.

At a very young age I realized that I will not allow an author to dictate to me who to like and who to dislike. I will not allow ‘anyone’ to do that to me. Even now at 28, I am still seeing fans asking others to ‘justify’ their interest in a ‘problematic’ character, and frankly, I am tired of seeing that. I am sure that characters like Draco are, too.

So I guess, what I am trying to say, is that my interest in Draco at such an early age taught me how to liberate my mind, my imagination, my opinions. It taught me to think independently from the author, that I don’t have to agree with everything I read in books. That the ‘reality’ seen through Harry Potter’s eyes is subjective, that we all like to think of ourselves as the actual hero of every story, and in many cases, villian is not an unredeemable monster, but just someone who doesn’t agree with our version of reality. This realization helped me through a lot of hard times because my values differ greatly from those of my country - which is a dictatorship.

Liking Draco Malfoy was the harder choice, but it taught me more things than going with the flow would have ever done.

So…happy birthday Draco Malfoy.
